edu.ucdavis.cstars.client.arcgis

Class PortalGroup

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject
      • edu.ucdavis.cstars.client.arcgis.PortalGroup

  • public class PortalGroup
extends com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject
    Execute a query against the Portal to return a deferred that when resolved returns PortalQueryResult that contain a results array of PortalGroup ojbects for all the groups that match the input query.
    Author:
    Justin Merz

      • getTitle

        public final java.lang.String getTitle()
        The title for the group. This is the name that is displayed to users and by which they refer to the group. Every group must have a title and it must be unique for a user.
        Returns:
        String

      • getMembers

        public final Deferred getMembers(PortalGroupMembersCallback callback)
        Get the current members for the group. Returns a deferred that when resolved provides access to a PortalGroupMembers object.
        Parameters:
        callback - - handler to fire when members are returned
        Returns:
        Deferred

      • queryItem

        public final Deferred queryItem(PortalQueryParams queryParams,
                 PortalQueryItemsCallback callback)
        Execute a query against the group to return a deferred that when resolved returns PortalQueryResults that contain a results array of PortalItem objects that match the input query.
        Parameters:
        queryParams - - The input query parameters.
        callback - - function to fire when query completes
        Returns:
        Deferred
